name: Keep Colours Alive
description:
Keep Colours Alive

Click on the Colourmen with the same colour of the cursor to give them life until the reach the portal.

How to Play

ASDF: Change cursor colour.

Select a colour and grow a plant on the top right corner.

Collect plant with Black Cursor.

Click in the Colourmen before they die.

Click on the title text to start the game
